name: harshiloh
profile_summary: As a data-driven software engineer with a strong background in programming, I leverage my expertise in core technical skills such as Python, Java, and machine learning to drive innovation and scalable solutions. With a proven track record of successfully delivering projects through hands-on experience in cloud computing and API design, I effectively translate technical concepts into tangible results. My passion for software development and commitment to continuous learning enables me to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, ultimately driving growth and success for my projects and the people I work with.
